DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim clinical trial investigate pharmacokinetics somatropin healthy Japanese Caucasian subject , identify somatostatin-related adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Trial Healthy Caucasians Japanese Subjects Investigating Pharmacokinetics Somatropin
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent trial related activity Japanese Caucasian male respectively Healthy subject base upon medical history , physical examination , vital sign , ECG , serum biochemistry haematology urinalysis Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17 30 m2/kg , inclusive
